column1: Brief description     This chapter describes how the digital inputs and outputs, the analog inputs and outputs, and the motor brake output on the MSD Servo Drive and MSD Single-Axis Servo Drive Compact work and are configured.
- 9.5 Analog outputs (option only for MSD Servo Drive)     307
The buttons on this screen can be used to access and configure the individual input and output types.
- Before using the digital inputs, they are normally associated with a special device functionality for digital inputs with the use of function selectors.

,How can one access the 'Inputs/Outputs settings' in the device setup?,A1,Access the 'Inputs/Outputs settings' by navigating through the project tree to Device setup and then to Input/Output settings.,2.4375,2.515625,3.6875,1.4296875,0.51171875
